name: Strategy Pattern
description: Implement a pricing strategy pattern. Given a base price, quantity, and discount strategy ('none', 'percentage', 'bulk', 'vip'), calculate the final price. None: no discount. Percentage: 10% off. Bulk: 15% off if qty >= 10. VIP: 20% off always.
hints: Create different strategy functions for each discount type. The strategy pattern allows switching algorithms at runtime.
